<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>2.0.9</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.sn_compliance" name="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management" version="2.0.9" scope_name="sn_compliance" scope_sys_id="4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f" state="published" type="application" help="CSHelp:Policy-Compliance-Management" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true" license_model="producer">
<requires> <import plugin="com.sn_grc"/> <import plugin="com.snc.comp_attest"/> </requires>
<description>The GRC: Policy and Compliance Management application provides a centralized process for creating and managing policies, standards, and internal control procedures that are cross-mapped to external regulations and best practices. Additionally, the application provides structured workflows for the identification, assessment, and continuous monitoring of control activities.</description> </plugin>
]]></definition> <description>The GRC: Policy and Compliance Management application provides a centralized process for creating and managing policies, standards, and internal control procedures that are cross-mapped to external regulations and best practices. Additionally, the application provides structured workflows for the identification, assessment, and continuous monitoring of control activities.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Policy-Compliance-Management</help> <id>com.sn_compliance</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>GRC: Policy and Compliance Management</name> <path>plugin://com.sn_compliance/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.sn_grc,com.snc.comp_attest</requires> <scope>sn_compliance</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.sn_compliance</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>2.0.9</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
